snippet: The trial of Hissène Habré, who is charged with crimes against humanity, has had a tumultuous start, with the defense team failing to show up Tuesday.
abstract: Long-awaited trial of Hissene Habre, former strongman of Chad who is charged with crimes against humanity, is suspended after his defense team fails to show up; trial is set to resume on Sept 7.
lead_paragraph: The trial of Hissène Habré, who is charged with crimes against humanity, has had a tumultuous start, with the defense team failing to show up Tuesday.

headline.main: Trial of Ex-Leader of Chad Suspended After He Refuses to Speak
headline.print_headline: Judges Suspend War Crimes Trial of Former Strongman of Chad

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
